byline.contributor: Omar Al-Jawoshy reported from Baghdad, and Michael R. Gordon from Erbil, Iraq.
byline.original: By OMAR AL-JAWOSHY and MICHAEL R. GORDON

abstract: Iranian-backed Mukhtar Army militia claims responsibility for rocket attack on camp of Iranian opposition group Mujahedeen Khalq outside Baghdad that killed 23 members.
lead_paragraph: A rocket barrage on a camp near Baghdad killed 23 members of an Iranian opposition group and provoked condemnation by the United States.

headline.main: Iran-Backed Militia Claims Responsibility for Attack on Iraqi Camp
headline.print_headline: Shiite Militia Claims Responsibility for Attack on Iraqi Camp Housing Iranian Dissidents

snippet: A rocket barrage on a camp near Baghdad killed 23 members of an Iranian opposition group and provoked condemnation by the United States.
